item.title: Oil prices tick higher as attention turns to OPEC+ decision on crude production
item.description: Oil futures edged higher Wednesday as traders turned their attention to a weekend meeting of OPEC+.

item.title: Here’s why Wall Street’s previously most bearish bank now sees the S&P 500 hitting 6,500 in 2025
item.description: Rate-cutting central banks and more AI-related spending should support U.S. stocks

item.title: Volkswagen to sell controversial factory in China’s Xinjiang
item.description: Volkswagen has faced major criticism from activists and investors over its interest in the Xinjiang factory which it first opened in 2013

item.title: Technical analyst DeMark says his models are flagging major caution for the holiday week
item.description: Markets have often changed their trend around holidays, and one widely followed technical analyst says that shift may happen again.

item.title: How S&P 500 tends to perform during Thanksgiving week and into New Year’s Eve
item.description: U.S. stocks tend to post “solid” returns during Thanksgiving week, with even stronger gains during presidential election years, according to BofA Glob...
